title: My Aura Test
description: What energy and vibe do you give off? Discover your aura color!

questions.question: What's the first impression people get from you?
Where do you feel most comfortable?
To those around you, you are:
If your soul were an element:

results.title: Gold Aura
results.description: You radiate a brilliant Gold Aura! Like a warm sun, you illuminate those around you with positive energy and hope. You possess charisma and leadership, naturally attracting success and abundance.
results.advice: Shine your light on others, but don't forget to manage your own energy too.

results.title: Purple Aura
results.description: You possess a mystical Purple Aura! You have deep intuition and spiritual insight. With exceptional artistic sense, you see what others cannot. A mysterious atmosphere surrounds you.
results.advice: Maintain balance between the spiritual and physical world. Both are precious.

results.title: Blue Aura
results.description: You embody a peaceful Blue Aura! Calm and intellectual, you pursue truth and justice. With excellent communication and healing energy, you bring stability to those around you.
results.advice: It's okay to express emotions more. Don't let calmness be mistaken for coldness.

results.title: Pink Aura
results.description: You radiate a lovely Pink Aura! You carry the energy of pure love and romance. Delicate and deeply caring, love and harmony bloom wherever you are.
results.advice: Don't forget to love yourself too. You deserve to receive as much as you give.

results.title: Green Aura
results.description: You possess a healing Green Aura! Connected to nature with healing energy, you pursue balance and harmony. People feel at ease and healed near you.
results.advice: While healing others, make time to recharge your own energy.

results.title: Red Aura
results.description: You radiate a passionate Red Aura! Full of intense vitality and passion, you have courage and determination. You move fearlessly toward your goals.
results.advice: Learn to regulate your passion. Sometimes stopping to rest is also strength.

results.title: White Aura
results.description: You possess a pure White Aura! With clean, clear energy, you have the ability to purify your surroundings. Truthful and pure, you've reached a high spiritual level.
results.advice: Maintain your purity while harmonizing well with the world.

results.title: Indigo Aura
results.description: You possess a mystical Indigo Aura! With deep insight and wisdom, your third eye is open to see truths others cannot. You may have a mission to change the world.
results.advice: Share your vision with the world. There are people who need your insight.
